You can be provided data in the form of xml, table, meaning representations, graphs etc.

Dataset: webnlg

Here is the data, now generate text using the provided data:

Data: ['Alan_Shepard | birthDate | "1923-11-18"', 'Alan_Shepard | servedAsChiefOfTheAstronautOfficeIn | 1963', 'Alan_Shepard | deathPlace | California', 'Alan_Shepard | birthPlace | New_Hampshire', 'Alan_Shepard | award | Distinguished_Service_Medal_(United_States_Navy)']
Output:
final_response: Alan Shepard was born on November 18, 1923, in New Hampshire. In 1963, he served as Chief of the Astronaut Office and was awarded the Distinguished Service Medal by the United States Navy. He passed away in California.
